greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest nonnegative value taken on by nx^2 - 11y^2 for an infinite number of integer pairs (x, y).
mathematica: f[n_, z_] := FindInstance[x > 0 && y > 0 && n*x^2 - 11*y^2 == z, {x, y}, Integers, 1]; a[n_] := For[z = 0, True, z = z + GCD[n, 11], fz = f[n, z]; If[fz =!= {}, Print["a(", n, ") = ", z, " {x,y} = ", {x, y} /. fz[[1]]]; Return[z]]]; Array[a, 89] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 09 2016 *)
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
